cards.text: A car travels a distance of 2,538 km when its tank is completely filled. If the capacity of the tank is 54 litres, how much distance will the car cover if its tank has only 38 litres of fuel? [___ km]
If 9 workers can paint a room wall in 16 hours, how long will it take 12 workers to do it? [__ hours]
If 20 newspapers cost Rs. 90, find the cost of 9 newspapers. [Rs. ___]
In a race, Milan covers 5 km distance in 20 minutes. How much distance will he cover in 100 minutes? [__ km]
18 workers can dig a field in 18 days, in how many days can 12 workers dig the same field? [__ days]
If 12 males can dig a hole in 16 days, then 1 male can dig the same hole in how many days? [__ days]
If 12 metres of a wooden log weighs 16 kg, then what will be the weight of 3 metres of the same log? [__ kg]
14 cows can graze a field in 28 days. How many cows can graze it in 4 days? [__ cows]
If 30 metres of iron rod costs Rs. 1,920, how many metres of it can be bought for Rs. 2,880? [__ m]
The length of 1/4 part of a rod is 20 metre, what is the length of 1/8 part of the rod? [__ m]

description: Read the questions carefully and fill in the correct answers.
